displayName: Turning on my hotspot - Apple device

text: Follow these steps and you got it! 1. Got to your device Settings 2. Select Cellular Data, then Personal Hotspot 3. Turn on your hotspot [MSG_LINE_BR~05000] Was this information helpful?$waSession.buttons.optionsYesNo
